title: Strengthening Customer Service Competencies in Practice: Business English for Workplace Communication: Online-Based Practical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can utilize accurate grammar and expressions in work-related email writing at a rate of 90% or higher
Learners can understand and use basic video-conferencing terminology and expressions (e.g., 'agenda', 'follow-up') at a rate of 80% or higher
Learners can apply appropriate English expressions for customer service situations at a rate of 70% or higher
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
